channel.title: Lorawan on RAC's notepad
channel.description: Recent content in Lorawan on RAC's notepad

item.title: MakeZurich - PakMan
item.description: Project entry for the MakeZurich 2018 Hackathon. A delivery box which monitors the environment of it’s content and send an alarm via LoRaWAN in case a threshold breach gets detected.

item.title: MakeZurich - MoBiFloC
item.description:
Project entry for the MakeZurich 2017 Hackathon.

A cheap and portable bike commuter flow counter node to enhance the existing sensor network. This will also be helpful to quickly bring up nodes at the right place to evaluate new routes and how they are used.
